deposit_denom.description: The denom of the token that can be deposited into the vault.

subdenom.description: Inflow vault shares token subdenom. Used to derive the full token denom. E.g. if the subdenom is "hydro_inflow_uatom" then the full denom will be "factory/{inflow_contract_address}/hydro_inflow_uatom"

token_metadata.description: Additional metadata to be set for the newly created vault shares token.

whitelist.description: List of addresses allowed to execute permissioned actions.

description.description: Even longer description, example: "The native staking token of the Cosmos Hub"

display.description: Lowercase moniker to be displayed in clients, example: "atom" Also used as a denom for the non-base denom unit.

exponent.description: Number of decimals used for denom unit other than the base one. E.g. "uatom" as a base denom unit has 0 decimals, and "atom" would have 6.

name.description: Descriptive token name, example: "Cosmos Hub Atom"

symbol.description: Symbol is the token symbol usually shown on exchanges (eg: ATOM). This can be the same as the display.

uri.description: URI to a document (on or off-chain) that contains additional information.

uri_hash.description: URIHash is a sha256 hash of a document pointed by URI. It's used to verify that the document didn't change.
